actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the law of the District of Columbia relating to the practice of psychology to provide for the licensing of certain persons in the practice of psychology in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Provides that any person who was actually engaged in the practice of psychology in the District of Columbia on or before the effective date of this Act, and who was a member in good standing of the District of Columbia Psychological Association, shall be deemed to qualify to receive a license to practice psychology in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to amend the law of the District of Columbia relating to the practice of psychology to provide for the licensing of certain persons in the practice of psychology in the District of Columbia.
